places.name: Colosseum

places.name: Pantheon

places.name: Trevi Fountain

places.description: A magnificent Baroque fountain, famous for the tradition of throwing coins into its waters for a return to Rome.

places.description: The center of ancient Roman public life, with ruins of government buildings, temples, and markets.
